message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $95. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $75 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $87.  This is a very competitive price for a product of this quality.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $87 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $82. Can you meet me at that price?
